link_terms:
Before you can link your account, i'll have to inform you about a few things.
Account data can be collected in two ways: Through gyms and the friendlist.

**Gyms**
When you're defending a gym, your team, level, XP and won battles are saved by a bot. After you accept, anyone can view this data. Additionally, I'm going to always keep your discord level and team updated, so you'll never have to do it manually again.

**Friendlist**
After accepting, you're sent a bot's Pok√©mon GO trainercode. You can send them a friend invite to have all your in-game stats saved. These can always be queried using the `!stats` command. With `!leaderboard` you can check how you're doing compared to other local trainers.

If you don't want to be linked anymore, you can always unlink using the `!unlink` command.
link_success: ‚úÖ You're now connected to the Pok√©mon GO account {}
link_botcode: You can now send `{}` a friend invite to have even more stats saved
